name: The 6th International Conference on Social Sciences, Humanities and Arts
content: Spectacular Nice, France will be the host of the 6th International Conference on Social Sciences, Humanities and Arts – The social sciences conference of the year. With participants joining from all over the world, ICSHA 2024 is guaranteed to be a phenomenal learning experience for everyone involved – attendees and presenters alike. The program of social sciences conference is designed by our scientific committee – leading academics from world-class institutions – and, as such, it will be packed full of highly relevant subjects within the field. ICSHA is one of the most prestigious social sciences conferences of the year, both due to the publishing opportunities with indexed academic journals and the level of engagement during the three days of the event. If you haven’t yet registered, there is still time. Can’t travel to Nice? Consider joining virtually! We utilize top-of-the-line technologies to ensure a smooth virtual experience. We hope you will be able to join us this October!
